SAINT.Name: Martyr Paramon and 370 Martyrs in Bithynia (+250)
Martyr Philumenos of Ancyra and with him Martyrs Valerian and Phaedrus (+c.274)
Venerable Akakios of Sinai, mentioned in The Ladder (6th C)
Hieromartyr Habib, Bishop of Nekressi in Georgia (5th C)
Venerable Nectarius the Obedient, of the Caves of Kiev (12th C)
